verses.verse: וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> Now these [are] the names הַשְּׁבָטִ֑ים <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes מִקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> end צָפ֡וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> From the north אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> to the coast דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> of the way חֶתְלֹ֣ן ׀ <S%H2855><s%> of Hethlon לְֽבוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> as one goeth חֲמָ֡ת <S%H2574><s%> to Hamath חֲצַ֣ר עֵינָן֩ <S%H2704><s%> Hazarenan גְּב֨וּל <S%H1366><s%> the border דַּמֶּ֤שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <S%H6828><s%> northward אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> to the coast חֲמָ֔ת <S%H2574><s%> of Hamath וְהָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> running ל֧וֹ פְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> for these are his sides קָדִ֛ים <S%H6921><s%> east הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> [and] west דָּ֥ן <S%H1835><s%> [portion for] Dan אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> And by the border דָּ֗ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִ֛ים <S%H6921><s%> from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> unto the west אָשֵׁ֥ר <S%H836><s%> [portion for] Asher אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> And by the border אָשֵׁ֗ר <S%H836><s%> of Asher מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִ֛ימָה <S%H6921><s%> from the east וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> even unto the west נַפְתָּלִ֥י <S%H5321><s%> [portion for] Naphtali אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> And by the border נַפְתָּלִ֗י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִ֛מָה <S%H6921><s%> from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> unto the west מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> [portion for] Manasseh אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> And by the border מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִ֛מָה <S%H6921><s%> from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> unto the west אֶפְרַ֥יִם <S%H669><s%> [portion for] Ephraim אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> And by the border אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִ֛ים <S%H6921><s%> from the east וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> even unto the west רְאוּבֵ֥ן <S%H7205><s%> [portion for] Reuben אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> And by the border רְאוּבֵ֗ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִ֛ים <S%H6921><s%> from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> unto the west יְהוּדָ֥ה <S%H3063><s%> [portion for] Judah אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> a

וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and by גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> And by the border יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִ֖ים <S%H6921><s%> from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> unto the west תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַתְּרוּמָ֣ה <S%H8641><s%> shall be the offering אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תָּרִ֡ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> which ye shall offer חֲמִשָּׁה֩ <S%H2568><s%> of five וְעֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֜לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand רֹ֗חַב <S%H7341><s%> [reeds in] breadth וְאֹ֜רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> and [in] length כְּאַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> as one הַחֲלָקִים֙ <S%H2506><s%> of the [other] parts מִפְּאַ֤ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִ֙ימָה֙ <S%H6921><s%> from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> unto the west וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> and the sanctuary בְּתוֹכֽוֹ׃ <S%H8432><s%> shall be in the midst

הַתְּרוּמָ֕ה <S%H8641><s%> The oblation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you תָּרִ֖ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> that ye shall offer לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> in length חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> [shall be] of five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> in breadth עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and of ten אֲלָפִֽים׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וּ֠לְאֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become תְרֽוּמַת־ <S%H8641><s%> oblation הַקֹּדֶשׁ֮ <S%H6944><s%> shall be [this] holy לַכֹּֽהֲנִים֒ <S%H3548><s%> And for them [even] for the priests צָפ֜וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north חֲמִשָּׁ֧ה <S%H2568><s%> five וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֗לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְיָ֙מָּה֙ <S%H3220><s%> [in length] and toward the west רֹ֚חַב <S%H7341><s%> in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וְקָדִ֗ימָה <S%H6921><s%> and toward the east רֹ֚חַב <S%H7341><s%> in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וְנֶ֕גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> and toward the south אֹ֕רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> in length חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> five וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become מִקְדַּשׁ־ <S%H4720><s%> and the sanctuary יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God בְּתוֹכֽוֹ׃ <S%H8432><s%> shall be in the midst

לַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <S%H3548><s%> [It shall be] for the priests הַֽמְקֻדָּשׁ֙ <S%H6942><s%> that are sanctified מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons צָד֔וֹק <S%H6659><s%> of Zadok אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who שָׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> which have kept מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֑י <S%H4931><s%> my charge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not תָע֗וּ <S%H8582><s%> which went not astray בִּתְעוֹת֙ <S%H8582><s%> went astray בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who תָּע֖וּ <S%H8582><s%> went astray הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> as the Levites ס

וְהָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֧ם תְּרוּמִיָּ֛ה <S%H8642><s%> And [this] oblation מִתְּרוּמַ֥ת <S%H8641><s%> that is offered הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> shall be unto them a thing most קָדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6944><s%> holy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> by גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> by the border הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites

וְהַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites לְעֻמַּת֙ <S%H5980><s%> And over against גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> the border הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> [shall have] five וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> in length וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and ten אֲלָפִ֑ים <S%H505><s%> thousand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> all the length חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> [shall be] five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲלָפִֽים׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִמְכְּר֣וּ <S%H4376><s%> And they shall not sell מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> any וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or יָמֵ֛ר <S%H4171><s%> of it neither exchange וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not [יַעֲבוּר כ] (יַעֲבִ֖יר <S%H5674><s%> alienate ק) רֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> the firstfruits הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> for [it is] holy לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וַחֲמֵ֨שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> And the five אֲלָפִ֜ים <S%H505><s%> thousand הַנּוֹתָ֣ר <S%H3498><s%> that are left בָּרֹ֗חַב <S%H7341><s%> in the breadth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> over against חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> the five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand חֹֽל־ <S%H2455><s%> shall be a profane ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> [place] for the city לְמוֹשָׁ֖ב <S%H4186><s%> for dwelling וּלְמִגְרָ֑שׁ <S%H4054><s%> and for suburbs וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> and the city [בְּתֹוכֹה כ] (בְּתֹוכֹֽו׃ <S%H8432><s%> hope ק)

וְאֵלֶּה֮ <S%H428><s%> another מִדּוֹתֶיהָ֒ <S%H4060><s%> And these [shall be] the measures פְּאַ֣ת <S%H6285><s%> side צָפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> thereof the north חֲמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> four אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וּפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side נֶ֕גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and the south חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five [חֲמֵשׁ <S%H2568><s%> fif כ] מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> four אֲלָפִ֑ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמִפְּאַ֣ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִ֗ים <S%H6921><s%> and on the east חֲמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> four אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וּפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֕מָּה <S%H3220><s%> and the west חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> fif מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְאַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> four אֲלָפִֽים׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become מִגְרָשׁ֮ <S%H4054><s%> And the suburbs לָעִיר֒ <S%H5892><s%> of the city צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <S%H6828><s%> shall be toward the north חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתַ֔יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred וְנֶ֖גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> and toward the south חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתָ֑יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred וְקָדִ֙ימָה֙ <S%H6921><s%> and toward the east חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתַ֔יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred וְיָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> and toward the west חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3967><s%> two hundred

וְהַנּוֹתָ֨ר <S%H3498><s%> And the residue בָּאֹ֜רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> in length לְעֻמַּ֣ת ׀ <S%H5980><s%> over against תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> the oblation הַקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy עֲשֶׂ֨רֶת <S%H6235><s%> [portion shall be] ten אֲלָפִ֤ים <S%H505><s%> thousand קָדִ֙ימָה֙ <S%H6921><s%> eastward וַעֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and ten אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> westward וְהָיָ֕ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְעֻמַּ֖ת <S%H5980><s%> and it shall be over against תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> the oblation הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become [תְבוּאָתֹה כ] (תְבֽוּאָתֹו֙ <S%H8393><s%> ark ק) לְלֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> thereof shall be for food לְעֹבְדֵ֖י <S%H5647><s%> unto them that serve הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> the city

וְהָעֹבֵ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> And they that serve הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> the city יַעַבְד֕וּהוּ <S%H5647><s%> shall serve מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> it out of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַתְּרוּמָ֗ה <S%H8641><s%> All the oblation חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> [shall be] five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> by five וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand רְבִיעִ֗ית <S%H7243><s%> foursquare תָּרִ֙ימוּ֙ <S%H7311><s%> ye shall offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> oblation הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with אֲחֻזַּ֖ת <S%H272><s%> with the possession הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the city
